segments.text: I notice the angled view of the kitchen counter and sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is running full blast, basin overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets down onto the floor in a big puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is absorbed in her task, polishing that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is already wet, but she seems fine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It bothers me how unaware she is of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, the kids are causing their own trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the two-step stool looks so determined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His reach into the cookie jar is successful, I see.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed, ready to give way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands ready to catch a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their sneaky operation is kind of cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the slippery floor from the water is a real risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the tidy garden contrasts this indoor mayhem.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit sad thinking about potential accidents.
segments.speaker: PAR
